text: Kanematsu Yamada (山田 兼松 , September 16, 1903 – August 27, 1977) was a Japanese runner. He competed in the 1928 Olympics marathon, finishing in fourth place. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1977 deaths Category:Japanese male long-distance runners Category:Olympic athletes of Japan Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Japanese male marathon runners
title: Kanematsu Yamada
